definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The production of selenium ruby easing opal glass by using the said casing cullet has been recommended.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了利用硒紅套白瓷碎玻璃生產硒紅玻璃的經驗。

sentences.english: Ding Shaozao white porcelain body thin, creamy white glaze, looks fine.
sentences.chinese: 定窯燒造的白瓷胎薄，釉色乳白，造型精美。

sentences.english: Jingdezhen Yuan Dynasty greenish white porcelain was a heritage and development from the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 元代景德鎮青白瓷是對宋代的繼承和發展。

sentences.english: This paper expounds the ornamental art of white porcelain in Xing kiln.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了邢窯白瓷的裝飾問題。

sentences.english: Still have Fukien of virtuous turn a white porcelain product all very elegant.
sentences.chinese: 還有福建的德化白瓷產品都十分精美。

sentences.english: It means the top-grade white porcelain.

definition: celadon, classic Chinese style of ceramic glaze
bone china (fine white porcelain made from a mixture of clay and bone ash)
black eggshell pottery (of the Neolithic Longshan culture)
